body:
For 3 - I can actually see pros and cons for both versions.
Pros for args:
- It's simplifies all static type/shape inference logic. As an example "Slice" is one of the operators that at the moment have 2 versions and in many cases version with Argument is preferred for this reason.
- It simplifies setup with multiple machines, since you don't need to create blobs in multiple workspaces.
Cons:
- For inputs of large size - replication/storage will become a problem.
